content: sunshine scrubbie free crochet pattern by gumleaf crochet skill level advanced beginner information - this pattern is written in us terms - be conscious of your gauge and keep it quite firm - it will naturally curl on the edges which is managed by the final round - i use 2 chain as starting chain for both double_crochet & half_double_crochet just my preference - the starting chains will be counted as a stitch in each row - i start each round in the stitch at the base of the starting chain first stitch of the row - completed size is approx 10 5 cm diameter materials -8ply 100% cotton yarn allow 10 grams or 20 metres yarn -4mm crochet hook -darning needle -scissors abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet fpdc - double_crochet yarn over insert hook around the post of the stitch indicated working from front to back then continue double_crochet as usual instructions begin with magic_ring i double mine for extra security row 1 chain 2 counts as first double_crochet 11 double_crochet into magic_ring slip_stitch into the top of beginning starting stitch 12 double_crochet row 2 chain 2 fpdc around the post of double_crochet directly below in round 1 double_crochet into the top of the next stitch do not skip any stitches behind the fpdc stitches continue to fpdc & double_crochet alternately slip_stitch into top of beginning st 12 fpdc 12 double_crochet row 3 chain 2 double_crochet into the first stitch fpdc around the post of the fpdc below in round 2 1dc into each of the next 2 stitches fpdc continue around slip_stitch into the top of beginning st 12 fpdc 24 double_crochet row 4 chain 2 double_crochet into the next 2 stitches fpdc around the post of the fpdc below in round 3 1dc in each of the next 3 stitches then fpdc continue around slip_stitch into the top of the beginning stitch 12 fpdc 36 double_crochet row 5 chain 2 1hdc into each of the next 10 stitches then 2 half_double_crochet into the 12th stitch single half_double_crochet into the next 11 stitches & 2 half_double_crochet into the 12th continue to the end & slip_stitch into top of the beginning st you have increased the stitch count by 4 52 half_double_crochet row 6 chain 1 single_crochet into each stitch around slip_stitch into top of beginning st your work may curl a little but it will be ok 52 single_crochet row 7 this round will be a slip_stitch into the top of each stitch from round 6 be mindful of keeping your stitches more loose than tight basically to accommodate the size of the stitch below and stabilise the scrubbie complete the round with a slip_stitch into the beginning st 52 slip_stitch hanging loop from the end of round 7 chain 15 or desired length then secure it with a slip_stitch into the back of your work where the chain began fasten_off and sew in both tails very
